Pippin.intro:
Hey there! So, I've been customizing
my Vim setup lately and I wanted to share
some of my favorite settings with you.

One of the first things I like to do
is turn on line numbering. It's such a
simple thing, but it really helps when
I'm working on code and need to refer
to specific lines.

I also like to set the default
tab width to 4 spaces. It just looks
cleaner to me and makes it easier to
read the code.

Finally, I like to enable syntax highlighting
so that different parts of the code are
color-coded. It helps me quickly see
which parts are comments, strings, or
keywords.

What kind of settings do you have in
your .vimrc file?
